unnormalised: The study also notes a concerning trend of antibiotic resistance in certain bacterial infections. Samples tested at CMC Vellore showed resistance to commonly prescribed antibiotics like Amoxicillin and Ciprofloxacin. This poses a significant challenge to effective treatment. Experts recommend consulting a Dr. immediately upon experiencing symptoms and completing the full course of medication as prescribed.

unnormalised: Public health officials are urging residents to take preventive measures, such as using mosquito repellent creams and ensuring proper sanitation. The Ministry of Health has launched a nationwide awareness campaign to educate the public about infectious diseases and promote early detection and treatment. Free dengue testing is now available at govt. hospitals. For more info, visit mohfw.gov.in.
